title: 118 - HOLD THE LINE
description: On today's show, the guys dive into the craziness on the stock market and decide who in the room is holding the line and who is selling. They also dive into a loaded Pod FOD that has a lot of movie talk from Marvel to Godzilla vs. Kong to Wanda Vision and more, plus Nick unleashes a couple of new Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. Send your question or submission to be featured on The Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, have a great weekend. Get wild, but not too wild.
dc:creator: The Pod
